before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"fbih7","text":"The current protocol describes genotyping using rodent tail clips. This protocol has been verified using both rats (Sprague Dawley strain) and mice (C57BL/6J strain). It can also be applied to other types of biological samples, like blood, buccal swabs etc.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2fq6f","text":"Example genotyping applied includes PARK20 mice and sexing of wt rats.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"do6aj","text":"Operating scissors should be kept very sharp at all times, by cutting through aluminum foil or stainless steel sponges.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"51qka","text":"This protocol describes a very fast method (approximately 2 h) to do genotyping from rodent tail clips and other samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
ethics_statement: {"blocks":[{"key":"atlc3","text":"Any animal tissue or sample should be acquired in accordance with protocols approved by national and institutional regulatory organizations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"20pje","text":"Tail clips from mice or rats of appropriate age should be snipped using sharp operating scissors and in compliance to local protocols by national and institutional regulatory organizations and placed in sterile Eppendorf tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3j3ue","text":"Note: This protocol has been tested using the smallest tail clips possible of ~ 1 mm. Always clean the scissors with   Ethanol in between animals.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":117,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"70","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":206}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bfaa7","text":"Prepare PCR reactions at   as follows","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ahog7","text":"Note: Preparing a master mix is suggested for several samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"51ndi","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5flb5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bnrbc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"31sri","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a9dbi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["162","134"],"data":[["Component","Volume (ul)"],["Platinum master mix","10"],["DNA sample","1"],["Primers","0.4+0.4"],["Nuclease free water","8.2"],["Total","20"]],"guid":"265CE393F2CD4C439A32F3C6DBC93C0F","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Component","Volume (ul)"],["Platinum master mix","10"],["DNA sample","1"],["Primers","0.4+0.4"],["Nuclease free water","8.2"],["Total","20"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eh2la","text":"Add   of Lysis Buffer and   of Proteinase K in each sample tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2lsi4","text":"Note: Preparing a master mix is suggested for several samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.6","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

title: Fast rodent genotyping
